---

## Setup CI/CD Workflows

## Task
Configure GitHub Actions workflows for lint, test, build, and deploy.

## Sub-tasks
1. Create validation workflow (lint all file types)
2. Create test workflow
3. Create build workflow
4. Create deploy to GitHub Pages workflow
5. Configure GitHub Pages settings
6. Setup proper base URL for GitHub Pages
